name: Dream Fire Reverie
description:
Demons have invaded your dreams. explore the dream world, interact with the local dream residents, and get upgrades and weapons to shoot those demons.

Created for the Pigsquad Slowjam.  Game is still very WIP. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All Character sprites were made by me.

Tilesets were pulled from raou, and finalbossblues/(Time Fantasy sets).
Royalty free sfx, and songs were pulled from Ansimuz, Ryan McG, gamesupply, leviedaudio, and the Hanna Barbara Sound Library,
